alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 11:42AM PST until February 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, far Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Lincoln County and Esmeralda and Central Nye County. In California, Death Valley National Park and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will impact motorists on US- 95 between Mercury and Tonopah. Areas of blowing dust are likely near lake beds. Snow shower activity combined with the strong winds may lead to pockets of low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
